column5: Wow...it's been another brutal year with work and business travel but I finally got a chance this Canada Day weekend (TODAY) to get my ass in gear and get the boat lift, docks, and boat in the water....late or what?????  Anyhow, took advantage of the wife watching 2 1/2hrs of Coronation Street this morning and decided to troll home and make sure everything was setup on the boat..  Had a Muskie hit within 15 minutes of trolling over one of my go to spots and man was it nice to feel that girl on the end of my rod!!!  Not a big one but what a way to start the season off!!!
good for you, better late than never!
Nice Gettin a Muskie is on my bucket list this year
Hey now!!! that's a beauty 'ski you got yourself buddy!!  I'm going to have to get out with you again this season and try our luck for some big girls   Great fish  Jesse
Nice start to your season Steve, even though your season was a little late starting
